description: Regional hospital system with 15 facilities across 4 states. Uses Epic, Cerner, and various departmental systems.
B2B SaaS startup. Single product, cloud-native, all data in Snowflake.
Industrial equipment manufacturer with 22 plants globally. Mix of SAP, Oracle, and legacy MES systems.
Fast food franchise with 2,000+ locations. Each franchise uses different POS systems.
Analytics platform company. Unified tech stack, modern data infrastructure.
Regional bank formed from 5 acquisitions. Still running multiple core banking systems.
Power company serving 3 states. SCADA systems, customer billing, and field service all separate.
DTC e-commerce brand. Shopify store, all operations in one platform.
Freight forwarding across 40 countries. Different TMS in each region, acquired 3 competitors.
Small law firm. Single office, uses Clio for everything.
Property & casualty insurer in 12 states. Each state has different regulatory systems and legacy policy admin.
Seed-stage startup. Everything runs on Notion, Slack, and a single Postgres database.
Hotel chain with 150 properties. Mix of Opera, Cloudbeds, and independent PMS systems from acquisitions.
Single-site machine shop. One ERP system (JobBOSS), straightforward operations.
Consortium of 8 school districts sharing services. Each district has its own SIS, HR, and finance systems.
Research-stage biotech. Lab systems integrated, small team, modern stack.
Container shipping line. Vessel systems, port operations, and customer portals all disconnected.
Physician practice with 40 clinics formed from 12 merged practices. 4 different EHR systems still in use.
Enterprise software company. Dogfoods own integration platform, pristine data.
Auto dealer group with 25 dealerships. Each uses different DMS systems from CDK, Reynolds, Dealertrack.
